message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $110. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product, and I think that's a fair price considering the market value. Can you consider that offer?

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $105. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
